13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: Nikolay goes into depression as his corrupt practices are exposed. Later, Igor meets Nadia and tells her that her actions are wrong.

14.title: Episode #3.14
14.plot: Ira tries to present Nadia's idea of new shampoo as her own, but Aneshthesia catches her lies. Ira tries to convince Igor that it was her idea.

imdb.title: Bessmertnik
plot: Nadya and her stepsister Irina love Igor. When Igor's sister dies after getting hit by Irina's car, Irina and her father frame Nadya and get her sentenced for three years of imprisonment.
